artist: Artist: Edward Ruscha; Author: Edward Ruscha; Publisher: Multiples, Inc., New York
catalogue_raissonne: Foster 11; Engberg B11; The Open Book pp. 198-199; Auer 523
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund
description: Book contains 22 photographic illustrations; 52 pp. Book bound with pink satin ribbon, threaded through two holes and tied in bow on front cover. Title in green flocking on robin's egg blue cover. This copy: First and only edition.
markings: Stamped number [17857] in black ink on last page.
portfolio: From From the portfolio "Artists and Photographs," published by Multiples, Inc., in association with Colorcraft, Inc., New York, N.Y., 1970.
title: Babycakes with Weights
